Chapter 347 Collision of old and new nobles

"Use these methods together!

If we keep procrastinating like this, what will we have to pay back when the bond redemption period is reached?

When the run on tide breaks out and the kingdom's finances are overwhelmed by debts, everyone knows how serious the consequences will be.

I think it is necessary to formulate a reasonable repayment plan, recover the issued war bonds year by year, and reduce the total debt of the kingdom. "

Marquis Zuel said angrily.

As the oldest existence in the venue, the Marquis of Zuel most dislikes the irresponsible practice of only looking at the present and ignoring the future of the kingdom.

Although before this, the Alam family also took a bunch of war bonds to offset taxes, but that was just a means to fight for their own interests, and it did not mean that he wanted to bankrupt the kingdom.

As for the war bonds that appear in the tax, they can be apportioned directly to the provinces for processing. Whoever collects the bonds will be responsible for digesting them.

The little nobles have weak families, so there is no way to use war bonds to deduct taxes. Could it be that we can't stand it?

Everyone will hold fewer banquets and engage in some fancy activities, and save money.

If you don't have this awareness, you can go out now, the kingdom doesn't need irresponsible nobles! "

From the end of the war to the present, the total fiscal deficit of the mountainous area is as high as two million gold coins.

Especially after the hatching of the Warcraft cubs was completed, Hudson sent out more than 20 cubs one after another to offset the compensation for relocation.

This kind of self-destructive practice fell into the eyes of Earl Pierce, who mistakenly regarded it as a manifestation of lack of financial resources, which seemed reasonable.

Even if it is not suitable for forming a Warcraft Legion, it can also be distributed to the clan members to cultivate individually to enhance the strength of the family.

There are so many members of the Koslow family, and the family alone is not enough. If it is not financially tight, how can it be outflowed?

After all, the Dalton family is a rich man. Not only does it occupy the most affluent land in the southeast province, but it also monopolizes the sale of salt and ocean trade in the province.

There are no clear regulations on these temporary special taxes. However, according to past practice, there is a high probability that you will still have to pay.

The fiefdom is in vain, and it is all supported by its old capital. No matter how deep the family background is, it must be frugal at this time.

What is even more deceitful is that the money has to be spent every year, and there is a high probability that it will still increase every year.

A large amount of funds have been withdrawn, and territorial development and immigration relocation work will definitely be affected.

Since you are sitting here, you must bear corresponding responsibilities. We are all complaining about suffering and tiredness, what about the people below?

Count Carles said with a smile.

Once the proposal is approved, they can use legal means to take the opportunity to consume the financial resources of the emerging nobles and delay everyone's development progress.

If something happens in the middle of this, maybe the newly emerged nobles will be beaten back to their original forms.

Everyone has their own circle. Facing the suppression of the old nobles, a group of emerging nobles also secretly formed a group.

You probably know what the newly recovered seven northern provinces are like. If you want to develop it, it can't be done overnight.

Letting a group of aristocratic lords who can't make ends meet bear the debts of the kingdom, this is not an obligation, but their lives!

It's all about raising money anyway, so why not do it another way?

Instead of directly distributing according to the fiefdom, it is better to distribute it to the lucrative industry taxes such as salt, tea, spices, vehicles, entertainment, etc.! "

If you study carefully, you will find that behind almost all the profiteering industries, they are the veteran nobles.

"Earl Hudson, it seems that you have missed some industries, such as: weapons and equipment, iron products, and trading of Warcraft cubs. The profits of these industries are also not low!"

Earl Martinez said with a smile.

Only when the meat is cut on oneself will it feel pain. In his view, Hudson is simply standing and talking without back pain.

Welcoming the eyes of a group of veteran nobles who seemed to be smiling but not smiling, Hudson greeted him with a nonchalant smile.

"Count Martinez's reminder is very necessary, but there are so many profiteering industries, it is too embarrassing for me to finish it in one breath.

How about this, list all the profiteering industries that everyone thinks, and let's participate in the discussion together.

Of course, there is no need to mention outdated news.

For example: weapons and equipment.

The war has just ended for more than a year, and everyone has a large backlog of weapons, and there is no market for them in the kingdom.

By the way, it seems that the current iron products market is also in a depression. It is estimated that most practitioners are persisting at a loss.

As for the trade of Warcraft cubs, Earl Martinez thinks there are huge profits in it, so let's list it!

Unfortunately, judging from the current situation, it seems that it is very difficult for the kingdom to encounter several trades of Warcraft cubs a year.

Even if someone sold it, it was at an auction. Instead of looking for it all over the world, it is more convenient and quicker to directly increase the tax on the auction house.

Your Excellency, don't you want to set up a Warcraft breeding base and tax the major forces in the Northern Continent participating in the cooperation?

If you can't collect taxes without discrimination, don't expect Master Hudson to pay taxes alone. At worst, the cubs of magical beasts would appear suddenly and die suddenly, and some lucky nobles happened to pick up the cubs of magical beasts on the road.

"Earl Hudson, don't be so nervous. I'm just a small suggestion. If you really decide to levy the levy on the cubs of magical beasts, you can only be responsible for the contract!

But for the sake of the kingdom, I think you can consider giving it a try. If the negotiation is successful, the Kingdom may be able to increase its income by hundreds of thousands of gold coins every year. "

He said it beautifully, but in his heart, Earl Martinez secretly complained: Hudson is tough!

If he wasn't vigilant enough and didn't follow Hudson's words to refute, he might end up in a mess now.

Out of a mentality of revenge, he also planted a mine for Hudson.

Judging from the current situation, if Hudson is really greedy and wants to contract the Warcraft cub tax, there must be no problem.

As long as the tax amount is not too high, the major forces are willing to pay a sum of money to buy out the favors they owed before.

For the nobles, debts of favor are far more meaningful than gold coins. It doesn't matter if it is not useful at ordinary times, once it is used, it can save lives!

"Count Martinez's proposal is very good, but unfortunately, my ability is limited and I cannot undertake this important task.

If anyone has the ability to complete it, please stand up and take on this burden, I will definitely cooperate with all my strength! "

After finishing speaking, Hudson looked at everyone expectantly, as if he wanted to find a fool to take the blame.

It's a pity that everyone is very rational and has no interest in this kind of behavior of snatching food from the mouth of a tiger.

"Earl Hudson, the levy of industry tax seems good, but when it comes to the specific implementation stage, there are a lot of problems.

Most areas of the kingdom implement a tax package system, blindly increasing the collection target, and no one can guarantee that it will be completed.

What's more, high taxes will also impact the development of the industry. If it is not done well, it will not only fail to increase the financial revenue of the kingdom, but will reduce our income on the contrary!

Considering the difficulty of implementation, the easiest and quickest way to collect taxes is to directly distribute tasks to the provinces.

On this issue, we can actually consider giving proper care to economically poor provinces, and let other rich provinces bear the burden.

For example: The seven northern provinces that have just been recovered are still in the development stage, and it is difficult to undertake too heavy obligations in a short period of time, so they will not be assigned to them this year. "

Earl Pierce said with a look of concern for the country and the people.

After all, as the eldest, the Dalton family has the most fiefdoms, and naturally needs to bear the heaviest debt repayment obligations.

It's useless to see it, this is an overt conspiracy on the surface.

Abandoned the all-out attack plan, the newly emerging aristocratic group that was temporarily united because of interests suddenly fell apart.

Failed to implement a comprehensive suppression. Although the veteran nobles were unwilling, they could accept it considering that the southeastern province was willing to take on heavier obligations and be able to beat Hudson, the leader of the emerging nobles.

In the following meeting, Hudson kept a gloomy face and said nothing throughout, like a wronged teenager holding back his anger.

It was not until he got into the carriage that a mocking smile appeared on the corner of his mouth.

Deep in his heart, Hudson couldn't help sighing: Earl Pierce is such a good man!

He was still worried. This time, he was the first bird and violated the interests of a group of veteran nobles. How should he end up next?

At the critical moment, Earl Pierce came out in time to stab the knife and directly helped him through the difficulty.

Now everyone is busy gloating and watching his jokes, even if the resentment in their hearts has not completely disappeared, it is estimated that there will not be much left.

By the way, he also sold out to the king. He fell to this point, but it was caused by working for the king.

If Hudson's previous performance was not too active, which aroused the dissatisfaction of the veteran nobles, Earl Pierce's actions would not have been so easy to succeed.

The only regret is that the gang of emerging aristocrats are too timid, even if Hudson is the first bird, others dare not follow suit.

Realizing this, Hudson, who originally wanted to establish himself in the kingdom as the spokesperson of the emerging nobles, instantly dismissed this idea.

It's good to be the boss, but it's better to be the boss of this kind of unreliable group!

Not being the boss doesn't mean breaking these relationships. On the contrary, Hudson will continue to deepen the relationship with the emerging aristocratic groups.

Being cowardly now does not mean being cowardly in the future.

Essentially, the political weakness of these people is caused by their own lack of strength.

Including Hudson himself, if the military strength in his hands is not weak, no matter how high Caesar III bids, he would not dare to enter this muddy water.

Even if the strength in your hands is not weak, in the face of the general trend, you still have to admit cowardly when you should be cowardly.

Of course, the most important thing is that the consequences seem to be serious, but the actual harm is not great.

The "repayment tax" seems to be a huge number, but the Alpha Kingdom has 32 provinces. Even if the newly recovered seven northern provinces are excluded, there are still 25 provinces to share.

No matter how proud Earl Pierce was, he would never be able to take advantage of him and transfer all the tax money to the southeastern province.

According to the traditional distribution, the tax share that the wealthy southeastern provinces need to bear is at most ten to fifteen percent.

There are so many nobles in the province sharing the share, judging from many factors such as the area of ​​the fiefdom and the economic development, what ultimately falls on the Koslow family is nothing more than one-tenth to one-eighth of the provincial tax.

Before the carriage had time to leave the palace, it was stopped halfway.

"Your Earl, Your Highness the Crown Prince invites you to discuss matters!"

The maid's crisp voice interrupted Hudson's plan.

Perhaps Caesar III was really about to lose his hold. In recent days, the Crown Prince has been extremely active.

Banquet this great nobleman today, and invite that great nobleman tomorrow. Even among the middle class nobles, he never forgot to win them over.

"Lead the way ahead!"

Hudson said lightly.

…

Back home, Earl Pierce suddenly suppressed his smile. Obviously, he, the winner, was not as excited as the outside world imagined.

In order to interrupt the development of the Koslow family, the means used today are disgraceful. At least in the eyes of the nobles in the southeast province, he is incompetent as the boss.

The war bond in the tax is easy to solve, the big deal is that the Dalton family will eat it in one bite. Think of it as a financial investment, anyway, this is a capital-guaranteed transaction.

There are only hundreds of thousands of gold coins. It is undoubtedly worth paying such a small price in order to win people's hearts.

The trouble is the repayment tax. With him, the boss, taking the initiative, it is certain that the share of the southeast province will not be low.

Of the fifteen counties in the province, only Wright County is completely under the control of the Koslow family. This is the result of wanton replacement of fiefdoms.

There are quite a few newly reclaimed lands, but unfortunately none of them are recorded in the kingdom's records. It is almost impossible to expect Hudson to cooperate with the investigation.

Even if Wright County is a large county, the share that needs to be borne is very limited, and the remaining share has to be borne by the nobles in the province.

The Dalton family will naturally bear the largest share, but the younger brothers will inevitably lose their money. Everyone has complaints in their hearts, which is almost inevitable.

In the past, the Dalton family was the dominant family. When this happened, everyone could only endure it.

Now the situation has changed slightly. Although such a trivial matter is not enough to make everyone take the risk of jumping back to support the Koslow family, some comfort is still necessary.

Especially the neutral camp with the largest number of people needs to pay more attention to it, and it must not be won over by the Koslow family.

However, considering the financial resources of the Koslow family, Earl Pierce instantly relieved his worries.

Originally, the family was weak, and they were still doing a lot of infrastructure construction. Now that they have been drawn blood again, the pressure on the Koslow family can be imagined.

It is difficult to take care of yourself, so where is the spare energy to win people's hearts?

Even if the Koslow family suspends some construction projects and squeezes out a sum of money, it must first help the existing younger brothers instead of trying to win over the neutral faction.

When everyone is short of financial resources, who else in the southeastern province has the spare power to help the small nobles besides the Dalton family?

It is important to know that the "repayment tax" is not only collected for one year, but will continue for many years, and the amount of collection is still more than one year.

The southeastern province is indeed rich, but it can't stand the continuous toss. The little nobles who have just recovered from the war will have a high probability of suffering in the future.

It is estimated that more than one-third of the minor nobles in the province will have more or less financial problems. Either cut overhead, or go into debt.

"Master, but the plan succeeded?"

The old butler Gadri asked with concern.

"The plan failed and succeeded at the same time!

After all, Hudson is still too young. He lost himself after being touted for a few words, and actually regarded himself as the spokesperson of the military.

The plan to cut military spending was shattered under his agitation, including me.

But he paid dearly for it, and our backup proposal passed.

The Koslow family has no foundation and basically can't help financially. Next, let's look at Hudson, how much benefit he made in the war.

Send someone to keep an eye on the Koslow family. Once the finances are in trouble, Hudson is likely to take the risk of dealing with some shady spoils.

Collect the evidence first, and then look for an opportunity to attack them after the plan of the Warcraft Legion is completed.

Of course, it may also be a bargaining chip for negotiations. As long as the Koslow family is willing to move their headquarters out of the southeastern province, everyone can continue to be friends! "

Earl Pierce said confidently.

It is almost an open secret that combat troops divide up the loot that can be taken away. As the commander-in-chief of the army, it is also an unspoken rule to take the biggest piece of cake.

However, this is limited to some ordinary trophies, or unowned trophies, and there are also some trophies that need to be returned.

Obviously returned to the owner, this is just an ideal state. The various armies participating in the war were not so "honest", and were basically divided up in private.

Everyone is doing this, as long as some items with special significance or the identity of the original owner that can prove their identity are not sold publicly, it is not a problem.

This is also the reason why Hudson carts and carts pulled the spoils home after the war. It's not that there is no way to sell, but that they dare not sell.

If the news leaks out, the owner finds out that he is suspicious, and makes a fuss regardless, his noble reputation will be over.

The best choice is to take it home and store it first. After the turmoil is over, either find an opportunity to sell it in batches, or directly enrich your own heritage inventory.

The rich family background of the great nobles was gradually accumulated in this way. Items that cannot see the light now do not mean that they will not see the light in the future.

Time can dilute everything. Even an item with an owner will become an ownerless item after the baptism of time.

Even if you make up a reason to resell the item to the original owner, it is not impossible to operate.

"Master, according to the information we have collected, the Earl of Hudson took at least four million gold coins worth of spoils in this war.

About one-third of it was cash, and the other third was large sums of war bonds.

Mainly based on the bonds of the Principality of Moxi, at least more than one million, and the kingdom's war bonds are also hundreds of thousands.

Judging from all aspects of the situation, the Earl of Hudson should have realized part of the war bonds in private, otherwise the cash in hand alone would not be able to support the current expenses of the mountain leader.

It is said that he has a good relationship with the major chambers of commerce, and the remaining part of the spoils that cannot be realized in time is likely to be monetized overseas through the channels of these people.

In a short period of time, the finances of the Mountain Territory should be able to support it.

Restricted by the fact that the monster breeding base is located in the mountainous area, it is not convenient for us to use many means to consume his financial resources.

Now we can only wait for the impact of the repayment tax to further ferment and consume the last financial resources of the Koslow family before taking further actions and continuing to put pressure on them! "

After hearing the old butler's answer, Earl Pierce frowned.

Obviously, Gadri is opposed to a direct showdown with the Koslow family, but advocates boiling frogs in warm water to force this competitor away by economic means.

"Housekeeper, although Hudson is a little aggressive in territory construction, he is still very frugal in life.

In normal times, I neither like holding banquets nor obsessed with various activities.

The only thing that costs money is probably the magic experiment, but as a mage, there is nothing to say about being keen on magic research.

As a matter of fact, the current Koslow family does not show the face of a nouveau riche. The standard of living of most clansmen is not much different from that of ordinary noble families.

If you want to further consume their financial resources, I am afraid it will not be easy to do so! "

Earl Pierce said with a headache.

Had it not been for this information, which had been verified by many parties, Earl Pierce would not have believed that Hudson could make so much money.

It's not terrible just to make money, the key is that not only does he not spend money indiscriminately, but he also restrains his clansmen to be thrifty together.

Judging from the information collected by the Dalton family, the Mountain Territory does not have much cash, but the most expensive project has been completed.

Even if the budget is still in deficit in the future, relying on the dividends brought by the Warcraft breeding base, as long as the progress of various projects in the territory is slowed down, a balance can be barely achieved.

The problem of repayment tax, with the sale of spoils, can last for several years.

With a few more years of buffering, the Koslow family has gained a firm foothold, and it will be difficult to get them out.

"Master, no matter how frugal the Koslow family is, some necessary expenses are still indispensable.

You seem to have forgotten that their relatives are all over the province. With so many relatives, there are always a few who can't hold on.

They can ignore the nobles of the neutral faction, but they can't ignore the relatives and friends who support them, right?

It is too risky to directly attack the Koslow family, but it is much simpler to set up a game against these small nobles. "

After finishing speaking, the two looked at each other and smiled.

The little nobles' ability to resist risks is inherently low. If someone deliberately sets up a situation, it will be difficult to think of problems.

For these small characters, the Dalton family doesn't even need to take action personally, just a hint that it is within the scope of the rules can cause them heavy losses.

In the past, they didn't do this, because they have enough advantages, and there is no need to drop the bottom line like this.

Plus there is also Caesar III staring at it, if you are not careful, you will be caught by the king, and you will be unable to eat and walk around.

The critically ill king has greatly reduced his deterrent power to everyone. Some methods that he dared not use before can now be used.

…

"His Royal Highness, I have lost a lot of money in this transaction. You have to sell a few senior craftsmen to me as compensation!"

Even if he knows that the repayment tax cannot be avoided if the Alpha Kingdom does not breach the contract, this does not affect Hudson's complaints.

In any case, the extra repayment tax this time is all drawn out by working hard for the royal family.

If there hadn't been this turmoil, Earl Pierce would not have taken the initiative to take responsibility, and the southeastern province would not have to bear excessive obligations.

Even if you still can't avoid the repayment tax, when it is apportioned to the Koslow family, you can still pay 20,000 to 30,000 gold coins less every year.

One or two years is enough, the key is continuous, until the debt is paid off.

"Your Excellency, rest assured, the royal promise will definitely be fulfilled. We will not transfer any of the experienced craftsmen and boatmen in the shipyard, and they will definitely satisfy you!"

Crown Prince Caesar said with a smile.

It's just the faint disdain on the brows, which still reveals his contempt for Hudson deep in his heart.

A few craftsmen in the district had to raise it individually, and it was really hard for him to take a fancy to them because of their strong pettiness.

With a shipyard and sailors, want to participate in ocean trade?

This is purely a dream!

In the view of Crown Prince Caesar, building a ship is very simple, but the most difficult thing is to create a defensive magic circle for the ship.

Without these things, once encountering monsters at sea, the fate of shipwreck and human death will be lost in an instant.

The magician team of the Koslow family obviously does not have the strength to create an advanced magic circle for the ship, so they will definitely ask the Magic Association for help.

It's okay to be ripped off, the guys from the Mage Association are still very thieves, and they won't draw a high-level defensive magic circle at all if they don't take out precious magic materials.

The script is written.

Crown Prince Caesar was ready, and after Hudson hit a wall everywhere, he turned to the royal family for help and took the opportunity to accept a younger brother.

"Then thank you, Your Highness, for taking care of me!

I just don't know which shipyard the royal family is selling and how much is the price? "

It's not that Hudson is impatient, it's actually a seller's market now. To be called a large shipyard, not only must it be able to build large merchant ships, it must also have the ability to produce warships.

Under normal circumstances, these are not for sale. As long as someone is willing to sell, even if there is a pit behind, Hudson can only jump into it.

Who made the shipbuilding technology of the mountain leader so much ahead of the canoe?

It is definitely no problem to make a three-panel boat, and you can also build a five-panel boat if you work hard. As for ocean-going merchant ships and warships, they might be able to find out after another hundred years of hard work.

"Ha ha…"

"Since your Excellency the Earl is one of your own, I won't open my mouth. The shipyard that the royal family wants to sell is in the southeast province, which is just convenient for you to relocate.

The name, I guess you have heard of it. I was originally in charge of naval logistics, but you should know better than me what happened later.

The price of the shipyard is 800,000 gold coins, and the 1,700 craftsmen and 300 sailors in the shipyard, together with their family members of more than 6,800 people, are directly regarded as gifts. "

Hearing the offer from Crown Prince Caesar, Hudson wanted to say very much: Just a gift.

It's a pity that this is impossible. If I really do this, I will have no friends.

He hesitated for a while, but in the end he still didn't open his mouth to bargain.

In Hudson's view, this price is already very fair, and it can even be said to be generous. The shipyard that Crown Prince Caesar was talking about was the well-known Berkshire Shipyard in the southeastern province.

At its peak, it was once one of the three major shipyards in the kingdom. It's just that as the kingdom's strategy shifted to the mainland, the importance of coastal defense continued to decline. After the navy orders were gone, it had to turn to the civilian market.

However, in recent decades, the Dalton family's maritime business has advanced by leaps and bounds, gradually monopolizing most of the overseas trade in the southeastern province, and by the way, they have also built their own shipyard.

Berkshire Shipyard, which has lost a large number of orders, is getting worse day by day. If it weren't for the power of the royal family, it would have been squeezed out by the Dalton family long ago.

survived on sporadic orders, but the performance of Berkshire Shipyard is very touching.

From the profit of more than 100,000 gold coins a year in the peak period, it has dropped sharply to 10,000 to 20,000 gold coins a year now, and there will be losses in bad years.

If this situation continues, it is only a matter of time before Berkshire Shipyard goes bankrupt.

Choose to sell to Hudson at this juncture. In addition to political transactions, there is also concern that the new king will not be able to deter the local nobles during the throne change period and will dispose of risky assets in advance.

"Just follow His Highness's price!

However, the amount of funds involved in this transaction is too large. I won't be able to spend so much money for a while. I wonder if the royal family can accept the offset in kind? "

Since I decided to act, I had to do a full set. It was only when the front foot released a signal of lack of money, and the second foot was to buy a shipyard with a large amount of money, everyone knew that there was a problem.

At this critical moment, Hudson doesn't want to make a mess.

The Dalton family thinks that there is a financial problem in the mountain region, so they will continue to lead them to this, so as to save them from doing things behind the scenes and ruining the deal.

"Don't worry, Earl, the royal family is not unreasonable. We have always taken care of our own people.

If you do have financial difficulties, you can naturally offset it in kind. However, the items to be offset must be what we need! "

…

Chapter 349 Power Change

The deal was concluded, the meeting was over, and Hudson, who was on his way home, could only forcefully suppress the joy in his heart and put on a bitter face in front of everyone.

Looking at the high-spirited Earl Pierce, who kept pointing the country along the way, he couldn't help wanting to beat someone up.

Hudson's complexion is not good, let alone the mood of his subordinates. This wave of "repayment tax" apportionment, the southeastern province has taken over the bulk.

After much deliberation, in addition to Earl Pierce's proposed repayment of 6 million principal, the shortfall in bond interest paid by the finance department will also be apportioned to the repayment tax.

The final total amount of "repayment tax" was fixed at 9.37 million gold coins. A total of 1.3 million gold coins were apportioned to the southeast province, accounting for nearly 14%.

Such a high proportion of undertakings is short of engraved on the head-"take advantage of"!

Obviously, it is not easy to be taken advantage of in any world. The repayment tax of 1.3 million in the southeastern province will be shared by the nobles of the 15 counties in the province.

Except for Earl Pierce's younger brothers who can still laugh, the expressions of the others are not very good.

Especially the little nobles who were already in financial difficulties, their faces were even more gloomy and terrifying at the moment, as if their parents had died.

People who are in a good mood get together to chat and chat, and those who are in a bad mood get together to complain to each other, and soon the team becomes two distinct waves.

Seeing several mid-level nobles in the province join Earl Pierce's team one after another, Hudson immediately realized that something was wrong.

The situation was very obvious. Earl Pierce obviously realized how much hatred he had done, and took action in advance to win over the powerful factions in the province.

Different from emerging aristocrats who need to spend a lot of money on construction, established aristocrats only need to operate the fief step by step, and they don't need much capital.

Even if they pay an extra repayment tax now, the impact on them is very limited, nothing more than feeling a little uncomfortable.

With the influence of the Dalton family, it couldn't be easier to appease everyone. Maybe they will not only lose money, but also have a chance to make a fortune.

For example: acquiescing to some of their small actions.

Everyone bears the economic loss together, and the worst must be the little nobles at the bottom. Otherwise, there will be a bunch of unlucky people who will fall into the family because of financial bankruptcy.

Here is the opportunity!

It is impossible to wantonly annex the land, but with the cooperation of the Governor's Mansion, there is still hope for taking one or two knight collars.

Especially at this moment, Caesar III's physical condition is worrying, and the kingship may change at any time, and the probability of taking advantage is even greater.

As far as Hudson knows, most of the land mergers within the Alpha Kingdom in the past hundred years have occurred during the period of kingship change.

Generally speaking, the lower the prestige of the new monarch, the longer it takes to control the court, the greater the appetite of the nobles.

Straightening his mind, Hudson's original idea of ​​taking the opportunity to win over the nobles in the province was instantly dispelled.

Not everyone is eligible to participate in the feast of land annexation. As an emerging nobleman, the Koslow family has not even digested the results of the current battle, and it is easy to fall into the target of public criticism if they engage in land annexation.

From the standpoint of the family, I can't engage in land annexation to strengthen my strength. The best choice is to let the southeastern province maintain the status quo first.

There is no doubt that the strategy of the Koslow family is contrary to the interests of the veteran nobles in the province.

Talking is not speculative, let alone a conflict of interests. Doomed not to be a one-way person, running to win people's hearts is a waste of effort.

The little nobles below seem to be easy to win over, and their interests are also in line with the Koslow family's strategy. Unfortunately, this group is too complicated.

There are salted fish nobles who want to maintain the status quo; there are also enterprising nobles who are waiting for the death of Caesar III, hoping to fish in troubled waters.

The situation of the salted fish nobles is usually not very good.

Their own strength is very limited, and they cannot withstand the wind and rain. Just surviving consumes all their efforts, and there is no soil for breeding ambitions.

If we really win over, we don't know how much strength we can increase, but the burden it will bring is heavy.

Not to mention the latter, the Koslow family a few years ago was an enterprising little nobleman, who directly used the system to force his children to continue to forge ahead.

Accepting such an aggressive younger brother, you can know it without thinking, and there will definitely be troubles in the future.

As long as the younger brothers match their own strength and ambition, that's fine. What I'm most afraid of is encountering a few scammers with high eyesight and low power, which will bring bad luck to the boss.

After making up his mind to wait and see the situation first, Hudson complained about everyone's complaints, and he didn't have the mind to pay attention to it.

However, the new younger brother may not be accepted, but the younger brother who has already been recruited has to be taken care of.

The nobles who are now mixed with the Koslow family are mainly composed of two parts.

Part of him followed Hudson to fight the world. He was used to his rise and rise, and he had too much confidence in him as the boss, so he defected here without thinking.

The roots of these people may not necessarily be deep, but they eat meat and drink soup with Hudson all the way. Whether it is military strength or their own financial resources, they are all top-notch among the minor nobles.

The other part of the younger brothers are old relatives and friends in the past, and the little nobles who just completed the marriage not long ago.

After the rise of Hudson, it is impossible to marry the Koslow family without any family background. The little nobles who are poor and white cannot catch the eyes of the big nobles.

Now those who are really in difficulty and need financial help are only a small number of unlucky ones among relatives and friends.

Due to various reasons, he perfectly missed the road to Hudson's rise and failed to catch a bowl of broth.

…

"Master Earl, shall we let the governor do whatever he wants?"

A familiar voice rang from his ears, interrupting the thoughts in Hudson's mind.

"Kately, you are too impatient. The game has just begun, why bother with it?

This time, we may not really suffer. Everyone paid more together, and the Dalton family needed to spend the most gold coins among the nobles in the province.

The family background of the veteran nobles is indeed rich, but it is also accumulated by the ancestors for countless years. According to Earl Pierce's current tossing method, it is impossible for the Dalton family to have no opinions.

One or two losses, everyone can still take the overall situation into consideration. Once the number of losses increases, it will be difficult to say.

But you have a point. If we let it go completely, people might think we are afraid of him.

This is good, let someone release the news, and say: Earl Pierce knows everyone's suffering, if you have no money, you can go to the Dalton family to borrow it! "

Hudson said with a sneer.

"Lord Earl, a rumor may not be of much use. The Dalton family is deeply rooted in the southeastern province, and ordinary minor nobles dare not provoke him at all.

Unless we take the lead in the dark, organize the nobles in the province to fight against him and refuse to pay the repayment tax.

However, there is also a serious problem. Once things become serious, the kingdom will definitely be disturbed. In order to raise funds for debt repayment, there is a high probability that various domestic forces will require us to continue to fulfill our tax obligations! "

Baron Kettley said worriedly.

Glancing at the little brother in front of him, Hudson doubted very much whether he had raised someone for nothing, and then he understood.

Kately's ability is indeed not bad, but after a series of blows, his confidence has long been wiped out, without the original arrogance and drive.

If you start your own business, this change is catastrophic. But as a younger brother, it's better not to be too ambitious.

"What you're talking about is just the normal situation. Humans are the most complicated creatures. Once pushed, they can do anything.

There is no need for them to go to war with the Dalton family. We only need to gather a group of small nobles who are financially bankrupt or on the verge of bankruptcy at the critical moment, and run to the gate of the Governor's Mansion to cry poorly.

It is difficult to find the governor, these are official business. Our Governor Pierce is a responsible aristocrat, because of him, everyone's life is difficult, so we can't let it go! "

Hudson said mockingly.

These are inconspicuous little tricks, but at critical moments, they can make Earl Pierce in a hurry.

If you don't help, it will affect your reputation if you spread the word;

In order to win over a bunch of shabby people to settle down and offend the powerful factions in the province, no matter how you look at it, it is a blood loss.

…

In the royal capital, Caesar III, who was supporting himself after sending away all the nobles in the country, lay down.

Originally, everyone was called this time, and there was another task-to formally confer meritorious officials in the war.

It's a pity that Caesar III's body couldn't hold on and he couldn't preside over the ceremony. Simply use the kingdom system: conferring nobles once every five years as an excuse.

Counting the days, it has been less than half a year since the last noble canonization, and it will be five years. Under normal circumstances, this kind of thing will be done together to save everyone another trip.

But the rules can be changed. Anyway, the actual benefits are all in hand, and now the only thing missing is a ceremony. No one wants to compete with the king on this small issue.

After all, dying people are not easy to mess with!

No one can guarantee that the current Caesar III can always remain rational. If he accidentally provoked him into a panic, and he insisted on dragging the early bird to meet the Lord of Dawn with his name behind him, wouldn't it be a tragedy?

"Little Caesar, from now on, all the affairs of the kingdom will be in your hands.

Since our ancestors founded the Alpha Kingdom, it has been passed down for more than 300 years. During this period, we have survived countless winds and rains.

Now you have the best Alpha Kingdom and the worst Alpha Kingdom.

Without the threat of orcs, we can develop wholeheartedly and catch up with several powerful countries in the Southern Continent; but also because of this, the country is no longer united as before.

The current dispute is just the beginning. As time goes by, the kingdom's internal strife will become more intense.

Remember one principle: Stability trumps everything.

On this basis, you have to vigorously develop the royal family's foundation and maintain the balance among the major domestic forces.

The great nobles are the pillars of the kingdom, but the small and medium nobles are the foundation of the royal family. No matter how the situation develops, they cannot be allowed to carry out land annexation.

I have already paved the way for you, it is up to you how to go next. All I can do now is to hold on for a few more days and fight for the last time for you.

Little...Caesar...you...will..."

In the end, Caesar III couldn't even connect the sentences together, and spit out words intermittently, which made everyone's tears fall straight down.

Crown Prince Caesar in front of the bed cried even more, but he continued to respond until Caesar III lost consciousness and fell into a coma on the bed.

The priests and magicians guarding the vicinity hurried forward and poured a bottle of mysterious potion into the mouth of Caesar III.

"Okay, little Caesar. Your Majesty is tired and needs to rest. You are also an adult, you have to learn to face it yourself.

Judging from His Majesty's physical condition, he can support it for another three months at most. You must control the court within these three months, and the complete power transfer will be smooth! "

Archbishop Tyron said with a sad face.

The most outstanding king of the Alpha Kingdom is coming to the end of his life. No one knows what the next era will be like.

The people present in the ward at this moment are all members of the royal family. We are all grasshoppers on the same rope, we all prosper and we all lose.

"Is there any way to make my father live longer? No matter what the price is, no matter what treasure is needed, I will try my best to find it!"

Crown Prince Caesar said excitedly.

Father's love is like a mountain, and I don't feel it very much in normal times, but when it's time for life and death, it suddenly becomes prominent.

The bits and pieces of the past kept reappearing in his mind. Even if he got into trouble and was beaten, it has now become a good memory.

"Okay, little Caesar. You are the next monarch of the kingdom, don't act like a little girl.

Your Majesty's body is exhausted, so don't torment him anymore. What you have to do is to take control of the court as soon as possible and let him sleep peacefully. "

The words of Archbishop Tyrone extinguished the last hope of Crown Prince Caesar. Without his father who can shield him from the wind and rain, he fell into endless hesitation at this moment.

After a long time, he nodded seriously.

"Prime Minister, my father has repeatedly explained: If I ask you for advice on political issues, where should I start?"

It can be seen that Crown Prince Caesar has grown up, but the price of growth is really heavy.

"Your Highness, the central government has been run by our royal family for hundreds of years, and most of the core important positions are in the hands of the royal family, so there is basically no trouble.

The real trouble you need to face now is still in the local area.

In addition to the royal family's jurisdiction, other major provinces are under the control of local nobles, and there are not many places where we can intervene.

The biggest problem in the previous kingship changes was that the local nobles took the opportunity to annex land. Now the strength of the great nobles in the country is already very strong, and their power cannot be allowed to continue to expand.

In fact, His Majesty has already left you a countermeasure, which is to use the mutual restraint among the nobles to maintain the balance of the kingdom.

In the days to come, whoever dares to carry out land mergers will be suppressed! "

…

Make up for yesterday
